short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Covid data of UK on 2022-05-20 only. Only data from one day (2022-05-20) is shown (provided by api.coronavirus.data.gov.uk)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created using https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/building-chrome-extension/ and is a test of the extension publishing process. The extension provides covid-19 data from api.coronavirus.data.gov.uk from 2022-05-20 (one day only).
